xqdoc:module.xqdoc:name: module.xqm

xqdoc:description.p: Library to support html5 rendering of single xqdoc source

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: transform xqdoc to html map { "root": "../../", "cache": false(), "resources": "resources/", "filename": "src\main\lib\parsepaths.xq", "show-private": true(), "project": "xqdoca", "source": () }

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqh:xqdoc-html2

xqdoc:annotation.name: xqdoca:module
xqdoc:annotation.xqdoc:literal: Html5 report on the XQuery source

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %Q{https://github.com/Quodatum/xqdoca}module("module", "Html5 report on the XQuery source") %Q{https://github.com/Quodatum/xqdoca}output("index.html", "html5") function xqh:xqdoc-html2($file as map(*), $model as map(*), $opts as map(*)) as document-node()
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:body:
function xqh:xqdoc-html2($file as map(*), $model as map(*), $opts as map(*) ) as document-node() { let $xqd:=$file?xqdoc let $_:=trace(concat($file?path,"->",$file?href),"module: ") let $d:=

{ $file?namespace }  { $xqd/xqdoc:module/@type/string() } module
{ xqa:badges($xqd//xqdoc:annotation, $file)}

{ xqh:toc($xqd,$opts,$file), xqh:summary($xqd/xqdoc:module,$opts), xqh:imports($xqd,$model), xqh:variables($xqd/xqdoc:variables,$file), xqh:functions($xqd/xqdoc:functions, $file, $model), xqh:when($xqd/xqdoc:namespaces[xqdoc:namespace],xqh:namespaces(?,$model)), xqh:restxq($xqd,$file),

7 Source Code

{ $xqd/xqdoc:module/xqdoc:body/string() }
}
return document{ page:wrap($d, $opts ) } }

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqh:summary
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqh:summary($mod as element(xqdoc:module), $opts as map(*)) as element(div)

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqh:toc
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqh:toc($xqd as item()*, $opts as item()*, $file as map(*)) as element(nav)
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:body:
function xqh:toc($xqd,$opts,$file as map(*)) as element(nav){ let $vars:=$xqd//xqdoc:variable (: [$opts?show-private or not(xqdoc:annotations/xqdoc:annotation/@name='private')] :) let $funs:=$xqd//xqdoc:function (: [$opts?show-private or not(xqdoc:annotations/xqdoc:annotation/@name='private')] :) return

{ $opts?project } / Module

{ $xqd/xqdoc:module/xqdoc:uri/string() }

  1. 1 Summary
  2. 2 Imports
  3. 3 Variables
      {for $var in $vars order by $var/xqdoc:name let $id:=concat('$',$var/xqdoc:name) count $pos return
    1. { concat('3.',$pos) } { $id }
      {xqa:badges($var/xqdoc:annotations/xqdoc:annotation,$file)}
      2. }
  4. 4 Functions
      {for $fun in $funs group by $name:=$fun/xqdoc:name order by $name count $pos return
    1. { concat('4.',$pos[1]) } { $name }
      {xqa:badges($fun/xqdoc:annotations/xqdoc:annotation,$file)}
      2. }
  5. 5 Namespaces
  6. 6 RestXQ
  7. 7 Source
}

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqh:imports($xqd as element(xqdoc:xqdoc), $model as map(*)) as element(div)

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: o/p details for function $funs has all defined arities

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqh:function($funs as element(xqdoc:function)*, $section as xs:anyAtomicType*, $file as map(*), $model as map(*)) as element(div)

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqh:invoked($invoked as element(xqdoc:invoked)*, $file as map(*), $model as map(*)) as element(details)

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqh:custom
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqh:custom($v as element(xqdoc:custom)) as element(p)

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description:
The @see tag provides the ability to hypertext link to an external web site, a library or main module contained in xqDoc, a specific function (or variable) defined in a library or main module contained in xqDoc, or arbitrary text. To link to an external site, use a complete URL such as http://www.xquery.com. To link to a library or main module contained in
xqDoc, simply provide the URI for the library or main module. To link to a specific function (or variable) defined in an xqDoc library or main module, simply provide the URI for the library or main module followed by a ';' and finally the function or variable name. To provide a name for a link, simply include a second ';' followed by the name. To provide text, simply include the 'text'. Multiple @see tags can be specified (one per link or string of text).

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqh:see
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqh:see($v as element(xqdoc:see)) as element(p)

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqh:annotations
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqh:annotations($v as element(xqdoc:annotations)) as element()
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:body:
function xqh:annotations($v as element(xqdoc:annotations)) as element(*) {
Annotations { for $a in $v/xqdoc:annotation return }
%{ $a/@name/string() } { xqa:literals($a/xqdoc:literal) }
}

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqh:namespaces
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqh:namespaces($namespaces as element(xqdoc:namespaces), $model as map(*)) as element(div)
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:body:
function xqh:namespaces($namespaces as element(xqdoc:namespaces),$model as map(*)) as element(div) {

5 Namespaces

The following namespaces are defined:

{ for $ns in $namespaces/xqdoc:namespace order by lower-case($ns/@prefix) return }
Prefix Uri
{string($ns/@prefix) } { page:link-module(string($ns/@uri),$model) }
}
